description: McZic is a plant growth regulator containing Gibberellic Acid (GA3) at 20% concentration. It is used for promoting plant growth, flowering, and fruit development in various crops.
application_rates: 3 grams per 10 liters of water or 300 grams per hectare
frequency_of_use: As per crop requirements and growth stage
side_effect: Follow manufacturer's safety guidelines. Use protective equipment during application. Store away from children and animals.
crops_pests: Rice, Potato, Cabbage, Brinjal, Chili, Tomato, Cucumber, Okra, Cauliflower, Gourd, Ginger, Capsicum
crops: Rice, Potato, Cabbage, Brinjal, Chili, Tomato, Cucumber, Okra, Cauliflower, Gourd, Ginger, Capsicum
pest: Growth promotion, Flowering enhancement, Fruit development
